title: Sport and coaching
creator_credit: Video Education Australasia and Tom Trikojus
brief_description: This program covers the specific coaching skills, different styles and characteristics of a respected coach. Can they understand how to cater for different skill levels from the beginner through to the skilled athlete? The following topics relating to caching are covered: motivation to become a coach; philosophies of coaching; safety - the coaches’ role; planning and goal setting; physiological development of athletes; psychological aspects; management and administration duties; competition day - role of the coach; accreditation requirements for coaching; coaching and its unique challenges; coaches and athletes, the athletes’ view. Support notes available. Suitable for Lower-Upper Secondary level students.
